QuestData.Title: The Stoneplow Convoy
QuestData.Description: I tried to save as many of the Stoneplow envoys as I could but these "mantid" dragged many of them off into the jungle.$b$bThese are civilians in need of our help.$b$bPlease take the herbs you gathered earlier. I've infused them with what gifts of the Light are still granted me. Use them on as many of the Stoneplow envoys as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Imperial Lotus Poultice on 7 Stoneplow Envoys.
